description: When dealing with the CVE-2024-43590, it was previously noted that the correct version was not published at the time of the notice. As of the latest update, the current version available for download is 14.40.33816, which can be obtained through official Microsoft links. This version may fix issues related to the exploitation of the outlined vulnerability in various Microsoft products. System administrators should ensure that they are using the updated software version to mitigate potential risks associated with this CVE. Not having the correct version could lead to systems being unprotected and vulnerable to attacks that exploit this specific flaw.
